price: How will they feel when the angels take their souls, striking their faces and their backs?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
